name: Vietnamese traditional dresses (Ao dai)- Great gift is made by you
description:
Vietnamese
dresses are not just a costume, but a glorious culture in Viet Nam, carried
about outlook in life of Vietnamese people, an expression of identity and
spirit of Viet Nam. Take part in this course, you will know how to draw the
pattern on paper, fabric cutting and sew ao dai. It can be exciting experience
and you will get the impressed souvenir for your trip to Viet Nam.
